channel.title: Project-Management on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Project-Management on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Building chatbot agent to streamline project management
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Umbrella is a project management platform tailored for athletes, musicians, creatives, and businesses alike, bringing everything from team collaboration to secure document sharing under one roof.

item.title: Building data pipeline for OGIF transcriber
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: At Dwarves, we needed an automated way to transcribe and summarize the recordings of our weekly OGIF events for our Brainery knowledge hub.

item.title: Project Operations Copilots
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Introduction to Project Operations Copilots Managing projects effectively requires careful attention to documentation, reporting, and smooth transitions between team members.

item.title: Project Reports System: A Case Study
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: At Dwarves, we’ve developed a monthly Project Reports system - a lean, efficient system that transforms our communication data into actionable intelligence for our Operations team.
